channel.title: Hosting problem
channel.description: can someone tell me how i can let my friend host my server? i need step by step. i tried letting him run the client and the run server thingy. stil didnt work. someone help please??

item.title: Hosting problem
item.dc:creator: @stevo592 stevo592
item.description:
@stevo592 wrote:

your friend needs to set every thing up needed to run the server so basicaly he needs to set up a server and dl ur client and source along with no-ip and log in with ur noip if that makes any since, if you need anything else or more explanisation just pm me

Read full topic
